app.name: AutoCast
app.tagline: Transform your written content into professional podcast scripts and high-quality audio using advanced AI technology. Support for multiple languages with natural-sounding voices.
app.poweredBy: Powered by Vercel AI and OpenAI. Transform any text into engaging podcasts.
app.privacyNote: Your API keys and content are stored locally in your browser. We prioritize your privacy and data security.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your preferences, API key, and script generation model.

theme.title: Theme Preference
theme.description: Choose your preferred theme. Auto follows your system preference.

language.title: Interface Language
language.description: Choose your preferred interface language and layout direction.

apiKey.title: OpenAI API Key
apiKey.saved: API Key is saved and loaded from browser storage.

model.title: Script Generation Model
model.description: Choose the OpenAI model for generating podcast scripts. More advanced models may produce better results.

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.description: Configure advanced AI parameters and system prompts for fine-tuned control.

systemPrompt.title: System Prompt Template
systemPrompt.customPlaceholder: Enter your custom system prompt here...
systemPrompt.customDescription: Define how the AI should behave and what style it should use for generating podcast scripts.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness: lower values for more focused output, higher values for more creative output.

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens
maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens for script generation (100-4000). Higher values allow longer scripts.

step1.title: Your Text Content
step1.placeholder: Paste your text here or upload files below to get started with AI podcast generation

upload.title: Drag & drop your files here
upload.description: Supports .txt and .md files only • Multiple files supported
upload.summarizeDescription: Recommended for multiple files to create a cohesive podcast script

step2.title: Podcast Structure Framework
step2.description: Select points to emphasize in your podcast script and provide specific details for each.

purpose.title: Define Your Purpose & Audience
purpose.description: Decide on the podcast's core message, niche, or theme. Identify who your target listeners are and what value you're providing them.
purpose.placeholder: e.g., 'Educational podcast for young entrepreneurs about startup strategies and mindset'

structure.title: Episode Structure & Format
structure.description: Determine the format: solo commentary, interviews, panel discussions, storytelling, or a mix. Develop a rough outline for each episode (e.g., introduction, main content, closing remarks).
structure.placeholder: e.g., 'Solo commentary format with 2-minute intro, 15-minute main content, 3-minute conclusion'

scriptwriting.title: Scriptwriting & Storyboarding
scriptwriting.description: Create a detailed script or bullet-point outline to ensure a coherent flow. Plan transitions, key stories, questions for interviews, and calls to action.
scriptwriting.placeholder: e.g., 'Use storytelling approach with personal anecdotes, smooth transitions between points'

branding.title: Branding & Identity
branding.description: Design a podcast name, logo, and introductory music that resonate with your concept. Create an engaging intro and outro that set the tone for each episode.
branding.placeholder: e.g., 'Professional yet friendly tone, include branded intro/outro, mention social media handles'

marketing.title: Marketing & Audience Engagement
marketing.description: Develop a launch strategy including social media campaigns, show notes, and a dedicated website or blog. Engage with your audience through social media, listener feedback, and Q&A sessions.
marketing.placeholder: e.g., 'Include call-to-action for social media, encourage listener feedback, mention website'

schedule.title: Consistent Schedule & Continuous Improvement
schedule.description: Establish a regular release schedule to build listener trust. Gather feedback, track analytics, and refine your content and delivery over time.
schedule.placeholder: e.g., 'Weekly episodes, mention next episode topic, ask for listener suggestions'

additionalNotes.title: Additional Structuring Notes (Optional)
additionalNotes.placeholder: e.g., 'Emphasize storytelling for the main content', 'Keep the intro under 30 seconds'

step3.title: Review Generated Script
step3.placeholder: Your generated script will appear here...

refinement.title: Refinement Prompt (Optional)
refinement.placeholder: e.g., 'Make it more conversational', 'Add a joke here', 'Explain X in simpler terms'

tts.title: Text-to-Speech Settings
tts.description: Configure how your podcast script will sound when converted to audio. Different models and voices offer varying levels of quality and character.

model.title: TTS Model
model.description: HD model offers higher quality audio with more natural intonation but uses more API credits.

voice.title: TTS Voice
voice.description: Choose a voice that matches your podcast's tone and style.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Generate professional podcast scripts and audio in minutes, not hours.

multilingual.title: Multi-Language
multilingual.description: Support for English and Persian with natural-sounding voices for each language.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your API keys and content are stored locally. We never see your data.

timeSaving.title: Time Saving
timeSaving.description: Transform hours of writing and recording into a simple 4-step process.

voices.alloy: Neutral, balanced voice with clear articulation
voices.echo: Male voice with deep, resonant tone and clear delivery
voices.fable: Female voice with soft, warm, and engaging qualities
voices.onyx: Male voice with authoritative, deep, and professional tone
voices.nova: Female voice with energetic, professional, and confident delivery
voices.shimmer: Female voice with conversational, friendly, and approachable style

models.standardDesc: Good quality voice with lower API usage
models.hdDesc: Higher fidelity voice with more natural intonation

default.name: Default
default.description: Balanced approach for general podcast content

educational.name: Educational
educational.description: Focus on clear explanations and learning outcomes

conversational.name: Conversational
conversational.description: Casual, friendly tone like talking to a friend
